text: Gbogbo eda si maa jade sodo Allahu (lojo Ajinde). Nigba naa, awon alailagbara yoo wi fun awon t’o segberaga pe: “Dajudaju awa je omoleyin fun yin, nje eyin le gbe nnkan kan kuro fun wa ninu iya Allahu?” Won yoo wi pe: “Ti o ba je pe Allahu to wa sona ni, awa iba to yin sona. Bakan naa si ni fun wa, yala a kaya soke tabi a satemora (iya); ko si ibusasi kan fun wa.”
